name: Richard Höchenberger
body:
### About Me
Foo bar baz.

### Publications
Please find my **ORCID,** **ResearcherID,** and **Google Scholar** profile [below](#connect).
* LT Boenke, **R Höchenberger,** A Zeghbib, D Alais, FW Ohl (2013): [Interaction of spatial and temporal processing in the context of audio-visual synchrony judgment and temporal-order judgment.](http://www.perceptionweb.com/abstract.cgi?id=v130807) Perception 42 ECVP Abstract Supplement, 171.
* LT Boenke, **R Höchenberger,** FW Ohl, D Alais (2011): [Temporal aspects of sound induced visual fission and fusion in the double-flash illusion paradigm.](http://i-perception.perceptionweb.com/journal/I/article/ic832) i-Perception 2(8), 832-832.
